title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 1100-1.5 - Office of Renewable Energy Siting and Electric Transmission Review Fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 1100-1.5 - Office of Renewable Energy Siting and Electric Transmission Review Fee

State Regulations
(a) The Office
shall charge a fee to the applicant in order to recover the costs of reviewing
and processing an application in an amount equal to one thousand (1,000)
dollars for each one thousand (1,000) kilowatts of capacity, which shall be due
at the time of application filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
1100-1.5

Transferred from 900-1.5

New

York State Register July 17, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 29, eff. 6/26/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
